title: Crypto Miner
description:
Multiple cryptocurrency miner application based on pooler's cpuminer. 

Features:
  - Multiple cryptocurrencies and algorithms
    - BTC and sha256d based coins
    - LTC and scrypt based coins
    - Yacoin and scrypt-jane based coins
    - Quarkcoin
    - Groestlcoin
    - Diamondcoin evolution v2
    - x11 based coins (DRK, Hirocoin, Limecoin...)
    - x13 based coins (ACE, B2B, GRC, XHC...)
    - x14 based coins (X14, WEB)
    - x15 based coins (RCE)
    - cryptonight based coins (BCN, Monero)
    - fresh based coins (FreshCoin)
    - keccak based coins (Maxcoin HelixCoin, CryptoMeth, Galleon, 365coin, Slothcoin, BitcointalkCoin)
    - hefty1 based coins (Heavycoin)
    - skein based coins (Skeincoin, Myriadcoin)
    - shavite3 based coins (INKcoin)
    - Blakecoin
  - Multithreaded mining able to run as many threads as the double of device core number.
  - Supports both http and stratum protocol.
  - Ability to manage multiple configurations to be able to change from one pool to other quickly.
  - Neon optimization support.
  - Menu option to show current session stats.
  - Option to set priority for the miner.
overview: Released in September 2014 by Jesus A. Oliver Molina.

products.name: Unlock full features
products.description: This will unlock full features like using more threads and setting higher priority for the miner so it will  run faster.
